name: and everything was fine
description:
-you broke the cycle-

-you let our world change-

-letting us grow-

-adapt-

-define ourselves by the ideas that were locked deep in our souls all this time-

-like flowers-

-you have allowed us to bloom-

--

--

-a n d  t o  w i l t  w h e n  w i n t e r  c o m e s-
